channel.title: evasion antisandboxing on shubakki
channel.description: Recent content in evasion antisandboxing on shubakki

item.title: Detecting and evading
item.description: Sleep isn’t for the weak Time based evasion techniques [T1497] are a relatively painless and efficient way of avoiding sandboxes. Sandboxes are heavily relied on to detect malicious activity dynamically. Hence, it’s a guarantee malware will do it’s best at staying under the radar, achieving this by either blending in or timing out the sandbox. One way of timing out the sandbox is simply making your malware sleep through it, exhausting the sandbox which makes it time out and assume the sample is benign.
